channel.title: [PI] MTP MarcBobs Source, ENABLING DROPS HELP ASAP
channel.description:
Okay after about 2+ weeks of searching for the answer to enabling drops on this pi source i still have not found an answer, yet vain claims is soo easy but he tells noone?
im getting sick and tired of looking how to ENABLE drops because somehow some reason some way they were drops in this source and i really need to enable them.
SOMEBDY HELP@@@@@
